description: Complete system overview documenting the AI-driven task management architecture, component interactions, and core subsystems including AI service integration, task analysis, and dependency management
Detailed documentation of core algorithms including task complexity scoring (1-10 scale), dependency resolution, AI-driven task generation, and scope adjustment algorithms with implementation details
Comprehensive documentation of task data models, their relationships, inheritance patterns, and state transitions including task/subtask relationships, dependency mappings, and tag-based organization
Technical documentation of AI service integration including provider management, prompt engineering, response handling, and the Model Context Protocol (MCP) implementation details
Detailed documentation of task lifecycle workflows, data flow between components, state management, and system-wide data synchronization patterns
